statements: SELECT * FROM cryptocurrencies
SELECT name, symbol, price FROM cryptocurrencies ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT id, name, percent_change_1h FROM cryptocurrencies WHERE percent_change_1h > 5
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrencies WHERE market_cap > 1000000000 ORDER BY percent_change_24h ASC
SELECT symbol, volume_24h FROM cryptocurrencies WHERE percent_change_7d < -2
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrencies ORDER BY name DESC, market_cap ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, name, symbol, price FROM cryptocurrencies WHERE price > 1000 AND volume_24h > 1000000 ORDER BY percent_change_24h DESC;
SELECT symbol, price, market_cap FROM cryptocurrencies WHERE percent_change_1h > 1 AND percent_change_24h < -1 ORDER BY market_cap DESC;
SELECT name, price, volume_24h FROM cryptocurrencies WHERE volume_24h > market_cap * 0.5 ORDER BY volume_24h DESC, price ASC;
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrencies WHERE percent_change_7d BETWEEN -5 AND 5 ORDER BY percent_change_7d DESC, percent_change_24h ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, name, symbol, market_cap, price FROM cryptocurrencies;
SELECT symbol, name, price, volume, market_cap FROM cryptocurrencies;
SELECT name, volume, change_percent, price FROM cryptocurrencies;
SELECT id, symbol, market_cap, volume, change_percent FROM cryptocurrencies;
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrencies WHERE market_cap > 1000000000;
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrencies WHERE price > 1000 ORDER BY market_cap DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT name, symbol, price FROM cryptocurrencies WHERE change_percent < 0 ORDER BY volume DESC;
SELECT name, market_cap, change_percent FROM cryptocurrencies WHERE volume > 1000000 ORDER BY change_percent ASC;
SELECT symbol, market_cap, price, volume FROM cryptocurrencies WHERE market_cap > 1000000000 AND change_percent > 5 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT name, symbol, market_cap, price, volume FROM cryptocurrencies WHERE price < 500 AND change_percent > -2 ORDER BY name ASC, volume DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrencies;
SELECT id, name, symbol, price FROM cryptocurrencies ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT name, symbol, market_cap FROM cryptocurrencies WHERE price > 1000;
SELECT * FROM market_trends WHERE trend_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT crypto_id, fluctuation_date, price_before, price_after FROM price_fluctuations WHERE price_after > price_before;
SELECT id, name, symbol, price, market_cap FROM cryptocurrencies WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, symbol, market_cap FROM cryptocurrencies WHERE price > 5000 ORDER BY market_cap DESC;
SELECT * FROM market_trends WHERE trend_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28' ORDER BY trend_date DESC;
SELECT id, name, price_before, price_after FROM price_fluctuations WHERE fluctuation_date = '2022-03-15' ORDER BY price_before ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT symbol, price, market_cap FROM cryptocurrencies WHERE price < 1000 OR market_cap > 1000000000 ORDER BY symbol ASC, market_cap DESC;
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrencies;
SELECT id, name, symbol FROM cryptocurrencies;
SELECT name, market_cap FROM cryptocurrencies ORDER BY market_cap DESC;
SELECT * FROM market_data WHERE price > 1000;

SELECT market_data.date, market_analysis.trend, alerts.alert_type FROM market_data JOIN market_analysis ON market_data.id = market_analysis.market_data_id JOIN alerts ON market_analysis.id = alerts.market_analysis_id;
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrencies;
SELECT name, symbol, market_cap FROM cryptocurrencies WHERE market_cap > 1000000;

SELECT ma.date, ma.price, ma.volume, ma.id, ma.cryptocurrency_id, c.name FROM market_data ma JOIN cryptocurrencies c ON c.id = ma.cryptocurrency_id WHERE ma.price > 500 AND ma.volume > 1000 ORDER BY ma.date DESC;

SELECT ma.date, ma.price, ma.volume, ma.id, ma.cryptocurrency_id, c.name, ma.price * ma.volume AS total_value FROM market_data ma JOIN cryptocurrencies c ON c.id = ma.cryptocurrency_id WHERE ma.price > 500 AND ma.volume > 1000 ORDER BY total_value DESC;

SELECT c.name, ma.trend, ma.momentum, a.alert_type, a.alert_message FROM cryptocurrencies c JOIN market_data md ON c.id = md.cryptocurrency_id JOIN market_analysis ma ON md.id = ma.market_data_id JOIN alerts a ON ma.id = a.market_analysis_id WHERE a.alert_type = 'buy';
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrencies;
SELECT name, symbol, price FROM cryptocurrencies WHERE price > 1000;
SELECT * FROM exchanges ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT crypto_id, date, high_price, low_price FROM market_data WHERE crypto_id = 1;
SELECT id, username FROM users WHERE id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT name, symbol, price FROM cryptocurrencies WHERE market_cap > 1000000 ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM exchanges WHERE location = 'USA' AND rating >= 4.5 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT id, transaction_type, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE exchange_id = 1 AND transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT users.id, users.username, transactions.transaction_type FROM users JOIN transactions ON users.id = transactions.crypto_id WHERE transaction_type = 'buy';
SELECT users.username, market_data.date, market_data.volume FROM users JOIN market_data ON users.id = market_data.crypto_id WHERE volume > 1000 ORDER BY market_data.date DESC LIMIT 5;
